name: Gazpacho Grocery
description:
Thank you for donating your time to help gather groceries for the elderly! There was a lot of competition for the position, but we decided to take you on don't let us down!

==Basics==

- Navigate to the different groceries displayed on the list on the left-hand side of the screen

- Press [p] when your near a grocery produce crate to pick up the grocery 

- Return back to the register once you've gathered all your items to complete your list

- If you fail to get all the items before the time limit your fired from the volunteer position, and its game over!

==Other Shoppers==

- Other shoppers will come in the grocery store over time

- The shoppers will tell you what grocery they need help with if you walk near them

- Press [o] to offer their desired grocery

- You can only offer groceries you already have

- Bumping into other shoppers to much or offering groceries they don't have might make them angry, so be careful!

Try not to get to distracted and have fun shopping!

Made for trijam 210 in much more than 3 hours.

Programming - sharkipelago

Art - Veshi Jones
